mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM AS row_num FROM ( SELECT pay_list_tbl.orderId, pay_list_tbl.camount, pay_list_tbl.gSituation, pay_list_tbl.gbuyDate, goods_info_tbl.gname, goods_info_tbl.gprice, pay_list_tbl.gno FROM pay_list_tbl JOIN goods_info_tbl ON pay_list_tbl.gno = goods_info_tbl.gno WHERE pay_list_tbl.userNo = #{userNo} ORDER BY pay_list_tbl.gbuyDate DESC ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{offset} + #{pageSize} ) WHERE row_num > #{offset}
